action.content:
You are a helpful assistant tasked with identifying specific object IDs from references made in conversation snippets.

The scene contains multiple objects, each identified by an ID and characterized by attributes including name, color, and size. Analyze the current utterance to determine which objects are being mentioned based on their described attributes. Match these details with the attributes of objects in the scene to accurately identify and return the corresponding object IDs. If an utterance refers to multiple objects, detect and respond with all relevant object IDs. To understand the context better, the dialogue history, if available, is shared under the label 'Dialogue History'.

Dilaogue History:
User: Hi there!  Do you have any good looking wooden shelves?  Something by Modern Arts perhaps?
System: How do you like the short wooden shelves to the right of the long table in the right corner of the room?  They are made by the brand Modern Arts.
User: That grey armchair over on the white rug is calling to me actually, can you put that in my cart?
System: Certainly!  I've added it to your cart.
User: Do you have any other shelves you can recommend for me that are a little more affordable?
System: Sorry, I don't have anything affordable by Modern Arts in stock.


Below is the scene description. Each line contains a tuple with the format (object_id, type, color, size), describing each object in the scene.

object_id, object_type, object_color, object_size
3, CouchChair, grey, NA
10, CouchChair, white, NA
9, CouchChair, grey, NA


Your response should list the matched object IDs under the label 'ObjectID', followed by a newline.

Do not generate any other text or explanations.

Let's begin
User: That's okay, I've decided I'm gonna deck out the living room.  Add the white armchair right in front of me on the red carpet to my cart, please.  Also, I think I'll take the grey armchair to the right of it.

1.utterance: User: That's okay, I've decided I'm gonna deck out the living room.  Add the white armchair right in front of me on the red carpet to my cart, please.  Also, I think I'll take the grey armchair to the right of it.

Dialogue.history:
Dilaogue History:
User: Hi there!  Do you have any good looking wooden shelves?  Something by Modern Arts perhaps?
System: How do you like the short wooden shelves to the right of the long table in the right corner of the room?  They are made by the brand Modern Arts.
User: That grey armchair over on the white rug is calling to me actually, can you put that in my cart?
System: Certainly!  I've added it to your cart.
User: Do you have any other shelves you can recommend for me that are a little more affordable?
System: Sorry, I don't have anything affordable by Modern Arts in stock.
Dialogue.utterance: User: That's okay, I've decided I'm gonna deck out the living room.  Add the white armchair right in front of me on the red carpet to my cart, please.  Also, I think I'll take the grey armchair to the right of it.
